name: Dwarven Descent (LD-48)
description: You play as a dwarf and your goal is to make it to the bottom of the cave while getting as high a score as you can. You can pick things up and throw them around to help you fend off enemies and get farther down. There are 8 treasures for you to try and find before making it down to increase your score. Killing Enemies, Collecting Coins, and getting to the bottom faster also all increase your score.
